    Ocean and Climate

    A physical oceanographer in the making!

    Photo credit: NASA

    Dong Jian

    I study physical oceanography

    • Hamburg, Germany
    • Twitter
    • GitHub
    • Instagram
    • Email

    I study Physical Oceanography, interested in Ocean Modeling, Data Assimilation, and Machine Learning.

    I worked on large-scale circulation using the adjoint technique, as my Master's thesis, under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Detlef Stammer and Dr. Armin Köhl at the University of Hamburg.

    Next step: I will work on small-scale circulation in the deep Red Sea, as a visiting student (Dec 2022- Jun 2023), with my host Prof. Ibrahim Hoteit at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology.

    Meanwhile, I am looking for a Ph.D. position starting around fall 2023.
